Gheris Hhune was a member of the Hhune patriar family of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
At some point in the , Gheris Hhune became afflicted by lycanthropy, the affliction that led him into the servitude of the Kozakuran vampire Cazador Szarr, the lord of the Szarr Palace in Baldurs Gate. Along with Blaise Hhune, Duver Rillyn, and other werewolves, Gheris massacred a party of influential guests at the Szarr Palace, shortly before Cazador attempted to perform his ascension ritual. Gheris was guarding the passage past the massacre site to Cazadors dungeon, and sought to please his master and gain his favor. The beasts and lycanthropes were likely put out of their misery by the Absolute Adversaries and the vampire spawn Astarion Ancun√≠n.
